mapper.select: SELECT emp.*, dep.*, rnr.*, pos.* FROM EMPLOYEE emp left join DEPARTMENT dep on emp.DEP_CODE = dep.DEP_CODE left JOIN RNR rnr ON emp.RNR_CODE = rnr.RNR_CODE LEFT JOIN "POSITION" pos ON emp.POS_CODE = pos.POS_CODE
SELECT * FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE DEP_CODE LIKE '___'
SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(DRAFT_NUM,7))) AS draft_num FROM DRAFT WHERE SUBSTR(DRAFT_NUM,6,1) = 'S'
SELECT * FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE DEP_CODE LIKE '__'

SELECT emp.*, dep.*, rnr.*, pos.* FROM EMPLOYEE emp left join DEPARTMENT dep on emp.DEP_CODE = dep.DEP_CODE left JOIN RNR rnr ON emp.RNR_CODE = rnr.RNR_CODE LEFT JOIN "POSITION" pos ON emp.POS_CODE = pos.POS_CODE WHERE emp.EMPLOYEE_NUM =${employee_num}
SELECT MAX(APPROVAL_LINE_CODE) AS APPROVAL_LINE_CODE FROM APPROVAL_LINE

SELECT al.*, e.NAME ,p.POS_NAME FROM APPROVAL_LINE al LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON al.EMPLOYEE_NUM = e.EMPLOYEE_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN "POSITION" p ON e.POS_CODE = p.POS_CODE WHERE approval_line_code = #{approval_line_code} order by approval_line_code asc, line_rank ASC
SELECT * FROM APPROVAL_LINE WHERE APPROVAL_LINE_CODE = #{approval_line_code} ORDER BY LINE_RANK ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum r, n.* FROM ( SELECT d.*,e.name FROM DRAFT d LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON d.employee_num = e.employee_num WHERE d.employee_num = #{EmployeeVO.employee_num} ORDER BY draft_num DESC ) n ) WHERE r BETWEEN #{Pagination.startRow} AND #{Pagination.lastRow}
SELECT d.*,e.NAME ,e.SIGN_FILE FROM DRAFT d LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON d.EMPLOYEE_NUM = e.EMPLOYEE_NUM WHERE d.DRAFT_NUM =#{draft_num} ORDER BY d.DRAFT_NUM ASC

SELECT sc.*, e.NAME, e.SIGN_FILE , p.POS_NAME, d.NOW_APPROVAL FROM SIGN_CHECK sc LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON sc.EMPLOYEE_NUM = e.EMPLOYEE_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN "POSITION" p ON e.POS_CODE =p.POS_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN DRAFT d ON sc.DRAFT_NUM = d.DRAFT_NUM WHERE sc.DRAFT_NUM = #{draft_num} ORDER BY sc.SIGN_RANK asc
SELECT r.*,e.NAME FROM REFERENCE r LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON r.EMPLOYEE_NUM = e.EMPLOYEE_NUM WHERE r.DRAFT_NUM =#{draft_num}
SELECT * FROM DRAFTFILE d WHERE DRAFT_NUM = #{draft_num}
